text: {"answer": "H", "reasoning": "i incorrect (Dunant inspired by Solferino 1859, not American Civil War; book published 1862). ii incorrect (Federal Assembly does not invalidate popular initiatives for ECHR violations; they go to vote). iii incorrect (intention defined in general part of Criminal Code, Art. 12 StGB). iv incorrect (constitutional principles like rule of law, proportionality in Art. 5 FC apply to Confederation and cantons)."}
